content:
Compiler Challenges for MORPH AMRM

  • Enable Monitoring and control of the adaptive memory hierarchy.

  • Enable application memory Access Analysis.

  • Combat Semantic Loss.

  • Set up reconfiguration Scripts.

  • Also, to be effective, the compiler needs to be:

    • Truly powerful
    • Truly at the machine level
    • Truly flexible and truly aggressive
